column4: One Question: I got the newest Hardy (8.04 with kernel 2.6.24-19) but want to use kernel version 2.6.22-15....what I did so far is changing apt sources to gutsy and installing generic kernel version 2.6.22-15 .... all ok...but when booting the kernel i miss a few modules...how do i get them?
